subject: Git problems
msgSnippet: All, David and I took y all s advice and tried importing JUnit into Git. We have a JUnit project on GitHub. The only problem is that when we tried cvsimport,
messageBody:
All,

David and I took y'all's advice and tried importing JUnit into Git. We have
a JUnit project on GitHub. The only problem is that when we tried cvsimport,
first it didn't exist on my Windows version of Git and then when David ran
it it imported everything except HEAD. Frankly, if I had to take my pick I
keep HEAD and throw everything else away, but we weren't given that choice
:-) Can someone who has been through the CVS->Git process walk us through
it? Feel free to contact me privately or on Twitter (@KentBeck).

Cheers,

Kent Beck
Three Rivers Institute
